textBox.richText: Best Paper Award at a ECCV Workshop

Venkatesh and myself received the best paper award for our paper “Fast Bounding Box Estimation based Face Detection” presented at the ECCV (European Conference on Computer Vision) Workshop “Face Detection: where we are and what’s next ?” on September 10 2010. This workshop was organized by Vidit Jain (Yahoo! Labs), Gang Hua (Nokia Research) and Michael Jones (MERL) and the award was sponsored by Microsoft Research Asia.
Best Paper Award sponsored by Microsoft Research
